channel.title: Credit Card Offering on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Credit Card Offering on FinanClub

item.title: BBD
item.description: score:883 Chances: Banco Bradesco SA is partnering with Amazon.com to launch a credit card offering in Brazil, expanding the bank’s fintech offerings. The launch of the credit card is expected next week and will be managed by Banco Bradesco, powered by Mastercard. The collaboration with Amazon.
